from scipy.optimize import linprog

    A = [[1, 0], [0, 1], [1, 1], [0, -1], [-2, 1]]  # Coefficients of the inequality constraints
    b = [30, 10, 25, -5, 0]  # Right-hand side of the inequality constraints
